title: Bug 9721Performance: avoid writing empty preference files
description: Bug 9721Performance: avoid writing empty preference files
OB: (After conversation with RG)A plugin's preference store is being written to a fileeven when there are no preference setting to remember.This is pointless and wasteful.Instead, when a plugin's preference store does not contain anygenuine entries, no file should be written (an existing filemust be deleted).This simple change would improve preference saving (which is also done on plugin shutdown).
